linkSkill.name: Tide of Battle
linkSkill.shortDesc: Activated when moving a certain distance. Max number of stacks: 4 times, Duration: 15 sec, Damage per stack: +4%
linkSkill.desc: Moving around grants a stacking %Damage buff

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-wings.png} tip={Crystalline Wings}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/lucent-gauntlet-mastery.png} tip={Lucent Gauntlet Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/lucent-brand.png} tip={Lucent Brand}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/ex.png} tip={Ex}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/aegis-of-light.png} tip={Aegis of Light}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand.png} tip={Umbral Brand}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/gauntlet-frenzy.png} tip={Gauntlet Frenzy}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-vortex-of-light.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/endless-research.png} tip={Endless Research}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/might-of-the-flora.png} tip={Might of the Flora}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/tenacity.png} tip={Tenacity}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/lucent-brand-ii.png} tip={Lucent Brand II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand-ii.png} tip={Umbral Brand II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-resonance.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Resonance}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-wings-of-glory.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/lucent-brand-iii.png} tip={Lucent Brand III}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand-iii.png} tip={Umbral Brand III}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/wisdom-of-the-crystal.png} tip={Wisdom of the Crystal}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/resonance-wings.png} tip={Resonance Wings}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-spear.png} tip={Longinus Spear}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin-ii.png} tip={Radiant Javelin II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/flash-crystal-battery.png} tip={Flash Crystal Battery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/hero-of-the-flora.png} tip={Hero of the Flora}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-deus.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Deus}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/vortex-wings.png} tip={Vortex Wings}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/floran-heros-will.png} tip={Floran Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/javelin-reinforce.png} tip={Javelin - Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/javelin-extra-strike.png} tip={Javelin - Extra Strike}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/javelin-boss-rush.png} tip={Javelin - Boss Rush}> Javelin - Reinforce, Extra Strike and Boss Rush_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Longinus - Cooldown Cutter}> Longinus - Cooldown Cutter_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deus-extra-strike.png} tip={Deus - Extra Strike}> Deus - Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin-ii.png} tip={Radiant Javelin and Winged Javelin (1st Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction II (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina and Reaction - Domination II (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-deus.png} tip={Deus and Ex (4th Job / 1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand-iii.png} tip={Umbral Brand III (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/vortex-wings.png} tip={Vortex Wings and Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-zone.png} tip={Longinus Zone (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-spear.png} tip={Longinus Spear (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first

6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_Each skill above should appear in 2 nodes_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin-ii.png} tip={Radiant Javelin and Winged Javelin (1st Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand-iii.png} tip={Umbral Brand III (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction II (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina and Reaction - Domination II (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/vortex-wings.png} tip={Vortex Wings and Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-spear.png} tip={Longinus Spear (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-zone.png} tip={Longinus Zone (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-deus.png} tip={Deus and Ex (4th Job / 1st Job)}>

credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Crystal Battery
content: In 2nd Job, after completing your storyline, Illium gains access to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deploy-crystal.png} tip={Deploy Crystal (2nd Job)}> an orb that you control and interact with. The orb has a special resource called "Charges" that is generated passively

Additionally, skills labelled as "Crystal Skills" can be used once you reach a certain amount of Charges. Crystal Skills do not consume Charges, instead they reset every time you hit the max amount of Charges. Crystal Skills can only be used one time until your Charges are reset
Below are all your Crystal Skills:

<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-vortex-of-light.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (2nd Job)}> Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light [2nd Job] - 30 Charges_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-resonance.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Resonance (3rd Job)}> Crystal Skill - Resonance [3rd Job] - 60 Charges_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-wings-of-glory.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory (3rd Job)}> Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory [3rd Job] - 150 Charges_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-deus.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Deus (4th Job)}> Crystal Skill - Deus [4th Job] - 90 Charges_>

Additionally, whenever <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> Radiant Javelin, <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb (1st Job)}> Radiant Orb, and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-spear.png} tip={Longinus Spear (4th Job)}> Longinus Spear hits the orb, it triggers an attack from the orb. <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction (2nd Job)}> Reaction - Destruction triggers when <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}}> or <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-spear.png} tip={Longinus Spear (4th Job)}> hits the orb and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-domination.png} tip={Reaction - Domination (2nd Job)}> Reaction - Domination triggers when <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb (1st Job)}> hits the orb

primary.name: Shelter Return
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100\nCooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: Teleports to Illium's hideout

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 50% of your equipment's Attack Power is converted to Magic ATT, excluding your weapon. Any set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 20% of your weapon's base attack power.

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec, Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/215/Exclusive_Spell} title={"Exclusive Spell"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Radiant Javelin
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4\nDamage against normal monsters: +20%
primary.desc: Launch a javelin that bounces between enemies
details: Attack can hit the same enemy multiple times
Javelins can also bounce off of the <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deploy-crystal.png} tip={Deploy Crystal (2nd Job)}> orb
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Radiant Orb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15. Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 50%, Number of Attacks: 1. Radiant Javelin Damage: +15% for 2 sec. after use, doesn't apply to HEXA Radiant Javelin.
primary.desc: Cast an orb forward that passes through and damages enemies
details: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> briefly deals increased %Damage after using Radiant Orb
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Ex
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Duration: 180 sec.\nMoves to the target and attacks for a short time. Damage: 140%, Attack ends after 40 hits.
primary.desc: Summon a robot that attaches to a target and deals damage
details: Attacks a target up to 40 times
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Crystalline Wings
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport horizontally a distance of 195, or vertically a distance of 275\nCannot jump after flight.
primary.desc: Teleport in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used while on ladders
While in the air, if you hold down the Skill Key, you can fly around
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump<bp_Cannot be used after flying_>

primary.name: Lucent Gauntlet Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Lucent Gauntlet Mastery: +40%, Critical Rate: +20%, Damage Taken: -40%

primary.name: Lucent Brand
primary.shortDesc: Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 20 sec\nAttack Power & Magic ATT +2 per stack\n[Passive Effects - Max HP & Max MP: +10%, Damage: +10%, DEF: +100]
primary.desc: When <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb (1st Job)}> hits an enemy, you gain a stacking Attack and Magic Attack buff
details: Also permanently increases %Max HP/MP, %Damage and grants flat DEF

primary.name: Crystal Battery
primary.shortDesc: Max Crystal Charges: 30\nCharge 3 magical power every 1 sec.
primary.desc: A special resource for using Crystal Skills that generates passively
details: In 2nd job, the orb only holds 30 Charges<bp_Once your orb reaches max Charges, it will reset back to 0_Using a Crystal Skill does not consume Charges instead, you can only use a Crystal Skill once per Charge reset_>

primary.name: Deploy Crystal
primary.shortDesc: Your Crystal Battery will reset 300 sec after reaching the max Crystal Charge count.
primary.desc: Upon use, summons an orb (that will not expire)
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will move it in front of you
Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together teleports the orb to your location
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together teleports the orb forward a fixed distance

primary.name: Reaction - Destruction
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 9 , Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: When <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> hits the orb, a destructive blast is released from the orb
details: Using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-spear.png} tip={Longinus Spear (4th Job)}> also triggers this attack

primary.name: Reaction - Domination
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 9 , Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 1\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: When <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb (1st Job)}> hits the orb, a radiant blast is released from the orb
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light
primary.shortDesc: Crystal Charge Cost: 30, MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 10
primary.desc: Beams of light spin around your orb damaging nearby enemies
details: Requires a minimum of 30 Charges to use

primary.name: Gauntlet Frenzy
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Duration: 300 sec, Lucent Gauntlet Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Machina
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 180 sec\nDamage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 4, Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Summon a robot that hovers over your <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deploy-crystal.png} tip={Deploy Crystal (2nd Job)}> orb and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Aegis of Light
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -70%\nMP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed from Boss: 3% of Max MP
primary.desc: Reduce damage taken (excludes %Max HP attacks) and your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max MP
details: MP absorption effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Umbral Brand
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 20 sec, DEF: 4%\nIllium's attacks inflict 20% bonus damage against Umbral Branded targets.
primary.desc: Enemies hit by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-domination.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction (2nd Job)}> gain a stacking debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy has reduced %DEF and takes increased %Damage from Illium (except from <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb (1st Job)}>)<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>

primary.name: Crystal Battery II
primary.shortDesc: Max Crystal Charges: 150\nCharge 3 magical power every 1 sec.
details: Increases max Crystal Charge from 30 to 150

primary.name: Reaction - Destruction II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 130, Max Enemies Hit: 9, Damage: 610%, Number of Attacks: 4, Detonations: 2, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 4 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Now activates twice in a row and has increased %Boss Damage

primary.name: Reaction - Domination II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 12 , Damage: 610%, Number of Attacks: 2\nCooldown: 4 sec
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction II (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 20 sec., Upon casting, immune to debilitating abnormal status effects for 3 sec.\nFinal Damage: +25%, Knockback Resistance: +100%, Boss Damage: +30%\nWinged Javelin: Explodes on contact, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 6, Normal Enemy Damage: +20%
primary.desc: Transform to fly and replaces <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/winged-javelin.png} tip={Winged Javelin (3rd Job)}> Winged Javelins
details: Requires a minimum of 150 Charges to use
Upon casting, briefly grants immunity to Critical Abnormal Statuses
While active, gain increased %Final Damage, %Boss Damage, and 100% Knockback Resistance
While active, you can still use <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-wings.png} tip={Crystalline Wings (1st Job)}> to teleport

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/winged-javelin.png} tip={Winged Javelin (3rd Job)}> deals increased %Damage to regular monsters and prioritizes bosses with the highest HP
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Unaffected by %Buff Duration

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Resonance
primary.shortDesc: Crystal Charge Cost: 60, MP Cost: 200, Resonance Cycles: 15, Effect: Grants Lucent Brand, Restores 10% of Max HP\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%]
primary.desc: Create a tether between you and the orb that inflicts <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand.png} tip={Umbral Brand (2nd Job)}> to enemies it touches
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Requires a minimum of 60 Charges to use

This skill also heals some %Max HP and grants <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/lucent-brand.png} tip={Lucent Brand (1st Job)}> upon contact with Illium or a party member

primary.name: Crystalline Wings - Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Crystalline Wings Teleport Distance: Horizontal +60, Vertical +45.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-wings.png} tip={Crystalline Wings (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Lucent Brand II
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 6, Duration: 20 sec
[Stack Bonuses] 1-3 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +2
4 - 6 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +4
[Passive Effects - Radiant Javelin Damage +200% points]
details: Increases max stacks from 3 to 6
Also permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Umbral Brand II
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 3 times, Duration: 20 sec
Reduces enemy Defense based on stack count.
[Stack Bonuses]1 Stack: DEF -4%
2-3 Stacks: DEF -4%
Illium's attacks aginst Umbral Branded enemies inflict an additional hit dealing 30%. The bonus hit's damage is multiplied up to 3x based on the number of Stacks.
details: Increases max stacks from 1 to 3
Now when attacking, deal an additional attack that increases in damage based on the number of stacks

primary.name: Might of the Flora
primary.shortDesc:
Max HP & MP: +20%
Damage: +15%
Jump: +10, Speed: +22, Max Movement Speed: +20
Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Tenacity
primary.shortDesc: Intelligence: +40, Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Endless Research
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +50, Critical Damage: +30%, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Crystal Battery III
primary.shortDesc: Max Crystal Charges: 150\nCharge 5 magical power every 1 sec.
details: Increases amount of Charges gained passively

primary.name: Radiant Javelin II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 95% points, Number of Attacks: 1\nOn Hit: Creates 2 shards that each inflict 130% damage. Upon using Winged Javelin: Creates 3 additional projectiles instead of shards which pursue enemies and strike for 250% damage 3 times.\n[Passive Effects - Increases Winged Javelin's damage by 200%]
details: When <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> hits an enemy, create shards that seek and attack nearby enemies<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/winged-javelin.png} tip={Winged Javelin (3rd Job)}> also fires extra projectiles that seek out enemies_>
Also permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/winged-javelin.png} tip={Winged Javelin (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Radiant Orb II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 2, Damage: +260% points
details: Increases %Damage of attack by a flat amount
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin-ii.png} tip={Radiant Javelin II (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Longinus Spear
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 950%, Number of Attacks: 8\nBoss Damage: +20%, Bonus Critical Rate: 100%\nCooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Throw a spear in the direction of your <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deploy-crystal.png} tip={Deploy Crystal (2nd Job)}> orb
details: Deals increased %Boss Damage and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
Also triggers <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Deus
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Duration: 15 sec
Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 5, Enemies Hit: 10
Satellites: Max Number of Summons: 5, Damage: 240% of continuous attack, Number of Attacks per Satellite: 40
[Passive Effects - Ex Damage: +100% (additive)]
primary.desc: Combine <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/ex.png} tip={Ex (1st Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina (2nd Job)}> to summon a giant robot that fights alongside you
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/ex.png} tip={Ex (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
Requires a minimum of 90 Charges to summon
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Vortex Wings
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1070%, Number of Attacks: 15\nOn struck enemies, Umbral Brand Stacks: 5\n[Passive Effects: Increases damage for Reaction - Destruction II and Reaction - Domination II by 135% points]
primary.desc: Create a shockwave that deals damage to nearby enemies and applies max stacks of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand.png} tip={Umbral Brand (2nd Job)}>
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction II (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-domination-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Domination II (4th Job)}>
Can only be used during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-wings-of-glory.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory (3rd Job)}> and only one time

primary.name: Resonance Wings
primary.shortDesc: Places Umbral Brands on enemies and Lucent Brands on allies, up to 12 targets.\n[Passive Effects - Crystal Skill - Increases Vortex of Light's damage by +100%]
primary.desc: While in <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-wings-of-glory.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory (3rd Job)}>, create projectiles that applies <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand.png} tip={Umbral Brand (2nd Job)}> to nearby enemies and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/lucent-brand.png} tip={Lucent Brand (1st Job)}> to nearby party members
details: Also permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-vortex-of-light.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, creates a Flora emblem\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Flash Crystal Battery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, immediately fully charges Crystal.\nCooldown: 121 sec

primary.name: Lucent Brand III
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 10, Duration: 20 sec
[Stack Bonuses]
1-3 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +2
4-6 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +4
7-9 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +6
10 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +10
[Passive Effects - Machina Damage: +100% points]
details: Increases max stacks from 6 to 10
Also permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Umbral Brand III
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 5, Duration: 20 sec
[Stack Bonuses]
1 Stack: DEF: -4%
2-3 Stack: DEF: -4%
4-5 Stack: DEF: -4%
Illium's attacks against Umbral Branded enemies inflict an additional hit dealing 40%. The bonus hit's damage is multiplied up to 5x based on the number of Stacks.
details: Increases max stacks from 3 to 5
Increases %Damage of additional attack

primary.name: Wisdom of the Crystal
primary.shortDesc: Lucent Gauntlet Mastery: +70%\nAttack Speed: +1, Knockback Resistance: +60%\nBoss Damage: +30%, Ignore DEF: +25%, Final Damage: +47%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage), %Boss Damage, %Ignore DEF, and %Final Damage

hyperPassive.name: Deus - Extra Strike
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Crystal Skill - Deus & Satellite Attack Counts: +1

hyperPassive.name: Deus - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Crystal Skill - Deus & Satellite Boss Damage: +20%

hyperActive.name: Crystalline Bulwark
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Invincibility: 2.5 sec., +0.4 sec per Lucent Brand stack\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Grants you and party members invincibility based on the number of Lucent Brand stacks currently active

hyperActive.name: Longinus Zone
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 3, Explosions: 4\nInvulnerable while casting\nCooldown: 120 sec
details: You are invincible while casting

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Flora class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Crystal Ignition
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Attack: 30, Max Key-Down Duration: 6 sec, DoT: 1715%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 15. Damage increased by 20% when attacking a boss.
You can use the skill while walking backward and can change directions by pressing the direction key twice
Damage taken while the key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, fire a beam of light forward
details: Deals increased %Boss Damage
Refreshes stacks of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand.png} tip={Umbral Brand (2nd Job)}> on enemies
While held, you can move but only walk backwards and cannot jump<bp_To change directions, press the Arrow Key of the direction you want to face twice_>
While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Reaction - Spectral Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1645%, Boss Damage: +20%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 1 sec
fifthMain.desc: When <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-ignition.png} tip={Crystal Ignition (5th Job)}> hits your <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deploy-crystal.png} tip={Deploy Crystal (2nd Job)}> orb, it splits forward into beams of light
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-ignition.png} tip={Crystal Ignition (5th Job)}> and you get both skills together

fifthMain.name: Templar Knight
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 12 sec, Disappears after 29 attacks.\nMax Enemies Hit: 12, DoT: 1180%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summon a stationary robot that continously pulsates and damages enemies within the attack
details: The summon disappears immediately upon attacking 29 times
Ignores by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Crystalline Spirit
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, A crystalline spirit forms near the mytocrystal for 65 sec.\nOnly 80% of Final Damage for React skill the spirit activates is applied, but if its the 5th skill, 100% is applied. Reaction skills activated by Crystalline Spirit are not affected by cooldown reset.
fifthMain.desc: Summon a stationary [Crystalline Spirit] at the position of the <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/deploy-crystal.png} tip={Deploy Crystal (2nd Job)}> that can also trigger Reaction skills and interact with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-orb.png} tip={Radiant Orb (1st Job)}>
details: Reaction skills triggered by the [Crystalline Spirit] deals reduced %Final Damage based<bp_5th Job Reaction skills deal full damage_>
Reaction skills triggered by the [Crystalline Spirit] are unaffected by cooldown resets

Does not reduce the number of enemies that can be attacked when interacting with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin.png} tip={Radiant Javelin (1st Job)}>
Cannot be used during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-wings-of-glory.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory (3rd Job)}>

fifthMain.name: Crystal Attunement
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Modifies the mytocrystal.\nCooldown: 3 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Using the Arrow Keys, choose between <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-spirit.png} tip={Crystalline Spirit (5th Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-essence.png} tip={Crystalline Essence (5th Job)}>
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-spirit.png} tip={Crystalline Spirit (5th Job)}> and you get both skills together

fifthMain.name: Crystalline Essence
fifthMain.shortDesc:
When the Reaction skill is activated, an imitation Reaction skill will automatically activate as well.
The imitation Reaction skill only has 80% of the original skill's Final Damage.
However, if the Reaction skill is a 5th skill, the imitation will have 100% instead.
The imitation Reaction skill is not affected by cooldown reset effects.
fifthMain.desc: When a Reaction skill is activated, an imitation Reaction skill is also activated
details: Imitation Reaction skill deals reduced %Final Damage based on the original skill's %Final Damage<bp_5th Job Reaction skills deal full damage_>
Imitation Reaction skills are unaffected by cooldown resets
Does not activate during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-wings-of-glory.png} tip={Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory (3rd Job)}>

Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystalline-spirit.png} tip={Crystalline Spirit (5th Job)}> and you get both skills together

fifthMain.name: Crystal Gate
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 110 sec, Max Crystal Gates: 3, activates after setting up at least 2. The setup time and the Crystal Gate duration are the same. After using it once, all Crystal Gates cannot be used for 2 sec and Crystal Gates you actually used cannot be used for 5 sec.\nPeriodically obtain Magic ATT +65 buff for 25 sec around the Crystal Gate. Direct skill attacks that hit during the buff will bombard 5 times through the Crystal Gate up to 3 enemies with 990% damage. Cooldown: 1.5 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec. Cooldown is reduced as much as 50% of the remaining cooldown if it ends before the Crystal Gate's duration.
fifthMain.desc: Place down a portal that allows you to travel back and forth between portals
details: To use the portal, press the Up Arrow Key on the portal<bp_Has a cooldown (2 secs) between teleports and the portal used also has a cooldown (5 secs)_>
While near the portal, gain a Magic Attack buff and successful attacks create explosions that damage nearby enemies
Using a portal can activate <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/link-skills/tide-of-battle.png} tip={Tide of Battle (Link Skill)}>
If the skill ends early, a portion of the cooldown is refunded based on the remaining duration

fifthBoost.name: Radiant Javelin & Winged Javelin Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Radiant Javelin & Winged Javelin Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Umbral Brand III Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Reaction - Destruction II Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Machina & Reaction - Domination II Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Machina & Reaction - Domination II Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Vortex Wings & Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Vortex Wings & Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Longinus Spear Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Longinus Zone Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Deus & Ex Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/radiant-javelin-ii.png} tip={Radiant Javelin and Winged Javelin (1st Job / 3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Radiant Javelin
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 3
When a javelin hits: Creates 2 shards that each inflict 200% damage
When hitting a mytocrystal or an enemy with a javelin, 1 mytocrystal shard are obtained, and up to one mytocrystal shard can be obtained per javelin
After obtaining 30 mytocrystal shards, the next javelin becomes an Enchanted Javelin
Enchanted Javelin: throws 3 javelins at once
If the Javelin Shard created by the Enchanted Javelin hit a single enemy, the final damage from the second Javelin Shard is reduced by 50%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Winged Javelin
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 925%, Number of Attacks: 6
When a javelin hits: Creates 3 magic missiles that attack 3 times with 375% damage
When a javelin hits, one glory mytocrystal shard is obtained, and up to one glory mytocrystal shard can be obtained per javelin
After obtaining 10 mytocrystal shards, the next javelin becomes an Enchanted Javelin
Enchanted Javelin: throws 3 javelins at once
If the magic missile created by the Enchanted Javelin hits a single enemy, the final damage from the second magic missile is reduced by 50%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/reaction-destruction-ii.png} tip={Reaction - Destruction II (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina and Reaction - Domination II (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/vortex-wings.png} tip={Vortex Wings and Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Reaction - Destruction
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 205, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1145%, Number of Attacks: 6, Detonations: 2, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 4 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Reaction - Domination
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 915%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 4 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Vortex Wings
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: 2200%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 15, Spell Storms: 5\n[Passive Effect: Enchanted Javelin Damage: +170% points]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/machina.png} tip={Machina and Reaction - Domination II (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/crystal-skill-deus.png} tip={Deus and Ex (4th Job / 1st Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Ex
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 105, Duration: 270 sec. Moves to the target and attacks for a short time. Damage: 504%, Attack ends after 40 hits.
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Machina
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 115, Duration: 270 sec.\nDamage: 735%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 5\nNumber of Attacks on Enemies in Crystal's Path: 1
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Crystal Skill - Deus
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 345, Duration: 15 sec.\nDeus Damage: 1460%, Number of Attacks: 5, Number Hit: 10\nSatellite: Max Number of Summons: 5, Max Number of Satellites per Enemy: 3, Damage: 278% of continuous attack, Number of Attacks per Satellite: 40
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/vortex-wings.png} tip={Vortex Wings and Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/umbral-brand-iii.png} tip={Umbral Brand III (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/illium/longinus-zone.png} tip={Longinus Zone (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Longinus Spear
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 180, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1790%, Number of Attacks: 14
Number of HEXA Radiant Javelin Mytocrystal Shards when Hitting Enemies or Crystal: 2, Number of HEXA Winged Javelin Glory Mytocrystal Shards: 3, Mytocrystal Charge: 15
Boss Damage: +20%, Bonus Critical Rate: 100%
Boss Damage During Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory: +20%
Cooldown: 13 sec.

meta: Illium is primary stat is INT and uses a new weapon called Magic Gauntlet and secondary weapons Lucent Wings. Illium revolves around the controlling a magical orb. You can move the orb around and attack with that orb which requires charging the orb and interacting with it
